original_title: Les grands sentiments font les bons gueuletons
overview: 1970s France. In this modern Parisian city suburb, the paths cross of two neighbours living on the same landing, Georges and Claude: one burying his mother, the other about to marry his daughter. Two family events which, on that day, are going to have to co-exist as best they can!
title: Les grands sentiments font les bons gueuletons
